fulltextMetadata.summary: This build script automates the compilation and setup process for a multi-language User Management System. It verifies prerequisites (Node.js, Rust, Python 3), installs dependencies, builds TypeScript components, compiles a Rust vector database, sets up a Python virtual environment, and constructs a React frontend. The script concludes by running comprehensive tests across all system components to ensure proper functionality.
